p: Two separate investigations were conducted (Table 1). The Patient cohort included all patients, who were tested for M. pneumoniae antibodies between 1 August 2017 and 31 January 2018 due to healthcare consultation and a clinically suspected M. pneumoniae infection at local GPs or hospitals in the Kymenlaakso region. Two or more sera were available from 67/327 (20%) of the cases.
